sn1.35:6.2: yathābālaṃ yathāmūḷhaṃ yathāakusalaṃ → yathābālā yathāmūḷhā yathāakusalā (sya-all, km, pts1ed, pts2ed)
sn1.35:8.2: nocidhāpagataṃ → nocīdha apahataṃ (sya-all, km); nocīdhāpagataṃ (pts1ed); no cidhāpagataṃ (pts2ed); nocidhāpakataṃ (?)
sn1.35:10.6: sova → sodha (bj, sya-all, km); so ca (pts1ed)
